languages.text: The wearer gains an additional +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} for each consecutive {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} that the wearer has not moved. Stacks up to 5 times.
languages.original_text: Персонаж получает +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} за каждый следующий подряд {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, когда он не двигался. Эффект суммируется до 5 раз.

traits.locale_text: The wearer gains an additional +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} for each consecutive {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} that the wearer has not moved. Stacks up to 5 times.
The wearer gains an additional +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} for each consecutive {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} that the wearer has not moved. Stacks up to 5 times.

The wearer gains an additional +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} for each consecutive {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} that the wearer has not spent {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. Stacks up to 5 times.

languages.text: 装备者每有一个连续{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}未移动过，就会额外获得1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。最多叠加5层。

languages.text: 使用者が移動しなかった{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}が継続するごとに、追加{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を+1を得る。最大5回までスタックする。

traits.locale_text: 使用者が移動しなかった連続{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}ごとに追加{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を+1を得る。最大5回までスタックする。

languages.text: El portador gana +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} adicional por cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} consecutivo en el que no se mueva. Este efecto se acumula un máximo de 5 veces.

languages.text: Der Träger erhält zusätzlich +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} für jeden aufeinanderfolgenden {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}, in dem er sich nicht bewegt hat. Bis zu 5-mal stapelbar.
